casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lester Gerard PACKINGHAM. No. 366PA13-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. Glenn Gerding, Chapel Hill, for Packingham, Lester Gerard. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. David L. Elliott, Raleigh, for State of North Carolina. Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of October 2015 by Defendant to Appoint the Appellate Defender:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused.
